40

Jim Good morning. I have an appointment with Olivia Gonzalez.

Receptionist OK. What's your name, please?

Jim Jim Berman.

Receptionist One moment. Can you sign here, please?

Jim Sure.

Receptionist And this is your visitor's pass.

Jim OK. Thanks.

Receptionist Please take a seat. Ms Gonzalez will be right down.

Olivia Hello Jim.

Jim Hi Olivia. Nice to see you again.

Olivia Nice to see you, too. Did you find us OK?

Jim Yes, no problem. Your directions were very clear.

Olivia Good. Would you like a coffee first?

Jim Actually, I'm fine.

Olivia OK. Let me show you round.

Jim Great.

Olivia So, this is Production and that's the main production line.

Jim How many people work on it?

Olivia About thirty I think. But let me introduce you to Diego. He's in charge of Production ...
